positions.subtitle: Landmark Group
positions.description: Preparation of Operation P&L at store level, Balance Sheet and Cash Flow at group level, Timely book closure, Working knowledge on IFRS 16 – Leases, Data building and verification of financial data through analytical reviews, Power BI working knowledge, Involvement with audit team for external audit, Preparation of monthly, quarterly and yearly final accounts, Identifying cost reduction areas, Preparation of other adhoc reports as required by Management along with preparation of MIS for the management, Preparation of Annual business plans for new territories along with budgeting and forecasting for existing territories, Actively involved in forecasting of weekly and monthly targets including sales and margin, to achieve budget, Monitoring stock loss.
positions.title: Senior Financial Analyst
positions.description_html: Preparation of Operation P&L at store level, Balance Sheet and Cash Flow at group level, Timely book closure, Working knowledge on IFRS 16 – Leases, Data building and verification of financial data through analytical reviews, Power BI working knowledge, Involvement with audit team for external audit, Preparation of monthly, quarterly and yearly final accounts, Identifying cost reduction areas, Preparation of other adhoc reports as required by Management along with preparation of MIS for the management, Preparation of Annual business plans for new territories along with budgeting and forecasting for existing territories, Actively involved in forecasting of weekly and monthly targets including sales and margin, to achieve budget, Monitoring stock loss.

experience.title: Deputy Manager
experience.description: Preparation of year end Financial statements under Local Gaap including Tax audits, reporting in compliance with IFRS, Treasury related activities including management of surplus funds of company, preparation of projected cash flows.
